item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

Meatspin.com is from a new breed of Internet shock sites and is quickly becoming a well-known internet meme. Upon visiting the website, a flash animation displays a video of two men having anal sex in the "reverse cowgirl" position. The man on top's penis is exposed and is flailing in circles (his "meat" is spinning, possibly where the website got it's name.)

Besides the crude flash animation, a song is looped in the background and a counter on the bottom displays how many times the flash animation has looped. (Although the counter states that it refers to the number of times the “meat” has spun.)

As of October 4, 2005, Meatspin.com is no longer active. WARNING: Contains graphic nudity.


From the deleted wikipedia entry

HTML of the page:

MeatSpin.com where you get the spin on meat! If you are under the age of 18, or find this offensive...THEN LEAVE!
<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=7,0,19,0" width="438" height="416">
  <param name="movie" value="spin_counter.swf">
  <param name="quality" value="high">
  <embed src="spin_counter.swf" quality="high" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="438" height="416"></embed>
</object>
Trick your friends into coming here: www.wowomg.com

Meatspin Forum - Meatspin Chat - Email us

.my_banner_class font{display:none;} .my_banner_class TD { font-family: Verdana; font-size: 10px; color: #3267cb; width: 137px; text-align: center; vertical-align:text-top; } .my_banner_class TD A IMG { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: none; border: 1px dashed #3267cb; } .my_banner_class .handle { font-family: Verdana; font-size: 10px; color: #7c3ca4; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; } .my_banner_class .age_gender { color: #3267cb; font-size: 10px; } .my_banner_class .location { font-size: 10px; color: #000000; } 
    </div>
  </div>
  <SCRIPT> 
                /* 
                ###################### 
                # Replace AFF images # 
                ###################### 
                */ 

                // custom settings 
                // =============== 
                // image directory: 
                var _imgdir = "http://www.meatspin.com/rnd/aff/"; 
                // =============== 
                // number of images in the image directory: 
                var _imgcount = 339; 
                // =============== 
                // image size: 
                var _imgwidth = "100px"; 
                var _imgheight = "100px"; 
                // =============== 
                // age range: 
                var _minage = 18; 
                var _maxage = 30; 
                // =============== 

                var _imgnumber = null; 
                var _unique = null; 
                var _done = null; 
                var _imgused = new Array(); 
                var _banner = document.getElementById("aff"); 
                var _images = _banner.getElementsByTagName("img"); 
                var _agespans = _banner.getElementsByTagName("span"); 

                for (var i=0; i<_images.length; i++) 
                { 
                     if (_images[i].src.indexOf("spacer.gif") == -1) 
                     { 
                          _done = false; 
                          while (!_done) 
                          { 
                               _unique = true; 
                               _imgnumber = Math.floor(Math.random()*_imgcount) + 1; 
                               for (var j=0; j<_imgused.length; j++) 
                               { 
                                    if (_imgnumber == _imgused[j]) 
                                    { 
                                         _unique = false; 
                                    } 
                               } 

                               if (_unique) 
                               { 
                                    _imgused[_imgused.length] = _imgnumber; 
                                    _images[i].src = _imgdir + "aff" + _imgnumber + "\.jpg"; 
                                    _images[i].style.width = _imgwidth; 
                                    _images[i].style.height = _imgheight; 
                                    _images[i].style.display = "block"; 
                                    _done = true; 
                               } 
                          } 
                     } 
                } 

                var _agedone = false; 
                var _age = 0; 

                for (var i=0; i<_agespans.length; i++) 
                { 
                     if (_agespans[i].className == "age_gender") 
                     { 
                          _agedone = false; 
                          _age = 0; 
                           
                          while (!_agedone) 
                          { 
                               _age = Math.floor(Math.random()*_maxage) + 1; 
                               if (_age >= _minage) 
                               { 
                                    _agespans[i].innerHTML = _age + "/F"; 
                                    _agedone = true; 
                               } 
                          } 
                     } 
                } 
           </SCRIPT> </td>
